headline: How Recent Developments Are Reshaping The CSX Investment Story
summary: CSX's updated narrative now reflects a slightly higher fair value estimate of $39.54 per share, up from about $39.29, as analysts factor in better than expected Q3 execution and clearer strategic direction under new leadership. A marginally lower discount rate, easing from roughly 8.57% to 8.55%, acknowledges a modestly reduced risk profile even as long term revenue growth expectations edge down from around 3.97% to 3.90% amid lingering macro uncertainty. As Wall Street opinion coalesces...
